meanings.definition: Unnilquadium: the chemical element with atomic number 104.
meanings.sent1: Scientists study unnilquadium to learn more about elements.
meanings.sent2: The periodic table includes unnilquadium as element 104.
meanings.sent3: When unnilquadium went to a party, all the other elements wanted to know its atomic number.
meanings.sent4: In the world of elements, unnilquadium shines brightly like a star.
meanings.sent5: The discovery of unnilquadium marked a significant advancement in chemistry.

meanings.sent1: Radioactive materials like unnilquadium can be harmful if not handled properly.
meanings.sent2: The Geiger counter detected the presence of unnilquadium in the sample.
meanings.sent3: Unnilquadium decided to start a band called 'The Radioactive Rocks.'
meanings.sent4: The radioactive glow of unnilquadium lit up the laboratory.
meanings.sent5: Wearing protective gear is crucial when working with unnilquadium.

meanings.sent1: Transuranic elements like unnilquadium have higher atomic numbers.
meanings.sent2: Unnilquadium is classified as a transuranic element due to its position in the periodic table.
meanings.sent3: Unnilquadium challenged uranium to a game of 'Elementary Battles.'
meanings.sent4: The journey of unnilquadium from the lab to the periodic table is fascinating.
meanings.sent5: Exploring the properties of unnilquadium opens up new possibilities in nuclear science.
